short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
description: Delivery of strainer, strainer element, and strainer body to CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** 
Strainers (GSIN: 4730)

**Reference Number:** cb-781-86477858
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-242498/A

**Publication Date:** February 15, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 1, 2024 at 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** March 1, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date:** March 8, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 7, 2025

### Tender Overview

The National Defence Canada requires strainers (GSIN: 4730) for various military installations. This solicitation is for two categories of strainers, including:

1. Strainers (Sediment):érnieere
2. Strainer Element (Sediment)
3. Strainer Body (Sediment)

The required quantities are as follows:

- Item 1 (Strainers): CFB Halifax (11 EA), CFB Esquimalt (9 EA)
- Item 2 (Strainer Element): CFB Halifax (4 EA), CFB Esquimalt (2 EA)
- Item 3 (Strainer Body): CFB Halifax (4 EA), CFB Esquimalt (7 EA)

### Tender Submission Requirements

Bidders must submit their proposals in either English or French.

- Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must indicate the brand name, model, Part Number, and NCAGE.
- Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Attachments

The tender notice and associated documents can be downloaded from the following link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32150/rfp-w8482-242498-a-eng.pdf (English)

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32150/rfp-w8482-242498-a-fre.pdf (Français)

### Contact Information

Katharine Bakrer
 Email: Katharine.Barker2@gmail.com
 Phone: (555) 555-5555

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Peru
